properties.name: pitchfork.forwarders.haystack.kinesis.enabled
properties.description: When true, creates a forwarder to Haystack Kinesis.

properties.name: pitchfork.forwarders.haystack.kinesis.endpoint-config-type
properties.description: Configuration type to be used for the Kinesis endpoint. Possible values are REGION (requires region-name) or CONFIGURATION (requires service-endpoint and signing-region-name).

properties.name: pitchfork.forwarders.haystack.kinesis.region-name
properties.description: Which region to send records to. If you do not specify the region and are running in EC2, the library will use the region the instance is in. Used when endpoint-config-type equals REGION.

properties.name: pitchfork.forwarders.haystack.kinesis.service-endpoint
properties.description: The service endpoint for AWS Kinesis. Requires signing-region-name to also be set. Used when endpoint-config-type equals CONFIGURATION.

properties.name: pitchfork.forwarders.haystack.kinesis.signing-region-name
properties.description: The region used for signing of requests for AWS Kinesis. Requires service-endpoint to also be set. Used when endpoint-config-type equals CONFIGURATION.

properties.name: pitchfork.forwarders.haystack.kinesis.aws-access-key
properties.description: AWS access key. Only required when authentication type is BASIC.

properties.name: pitchfork.forwarders.haystack.kinesis.aws-secret-key
properties.description: AWS secret key. Only required when authentication type is BASIC.

properties.name: pitchfork.forwarders.haystack.kinesis.authentication-type
properties.description: Authentication method for AWS. Possible values are DEFAULT or BASIC.

properties.name: pitchfork.forwarders.haystack.kafka.enabled
properties.description: When true, creates a forwarder to Haystack Kafka.

properties.name: pitchfork.forwarders.haystack.kafka.bootstrap-servers
properties.description: Comma separated list of Kafka bootstrap servers, for example 'kafka-service-1:9092,kafka-service-2:9092'.

properties.name: pitchfork.forwarders.haystack.kafka.topic
properties.description: Name of the Haystack's Kafka topic.

properties.name: pitchfork.forwarders.logging.enabled
properties.description: When true, creates a forwarder that simply logs incoming spans.

properties.name: pitchfork.forwarders.logging.log-full-span
properties.description: When true, logs the entire content of the span received. When false only the id is logged.

properties.name: pitchfork.forwarders.zipkin.enabled
properties.description: When true, creates a forwarder that publishes spans into a Zipkin collector.

properties.name: pitchfork.forwarders.zipkin.endpoint
properties.description: Endpoint for the remote Zipkin collector, for example 'http://zipkinhost:9411/api/v2/spans'.

properties.name: pitchfork.forwarders.zipkin.max-inflight-requests
properties.description: Maximum in flight requests for Zipkin http client.

properties.name: pitchfork.forwarders.zipkin.write-timeout-millis
properties.description: Write timeout for Zipkin http client, in milliseconds.

properties.name: pitchfork.forwarders.zipkin.compression-enabled
properties.description: Compresses spans before sending to remote Zipkin collector.
